a) None of the shares belonging to our Promoters have been pledged till date.

b) The entire Promoter's shares shall be subject to lock-in from the date of allotment of the equity shares issued through this Draft Red Herring Prospectus for periods as per applicable Regulations of the SEBI (ICDR) Regulations
c) All the shares held by our Promoter, were fully paid-up on the respective dates of acquisition of such shares.

The average cost of acquisition of Equity Shares by our Promoters have been calculated by considering the amount paid by them to acquire and Shares allotted to them as reduced by the amount received on sell of shares i.e., net of sale consideration is divided by the net quantity of shares acquired.
18. We have 7 (Seven) Shareholders as on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.
